website_summaries.verdict: Though they have some small shortcomings, Id America's Spark earphones look sharp, are comfortable to wear, and sound good for the money.
pros: The Id America Spark earphones are lightweight, comfortable, have a unique, appealing design, and sound quite good for their price point
They also include an inline remote for making cell phone calls, and they come with a protective carrying case
cons: The build quality of the inline microphone button is suspect
There are no volume controls in the inline remote
The microphone works with the iPhone but may not work with other smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Great while they work
customer_reviews.text: I read some great reviews on these headphones and gave them a shot for use on my commute to work. They sound great and fit well, but one side started to fade after 4 months. I used the snap case that came with the product to protect them while they were not in use but that did not seem to help. I am disappointed in the lack of longevity of this product.
customer_reviews.author: dAS

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job a Little Better than the Cheap Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This has become my "everyday" earbuds. They are clearer than the cheap ones I used in the past, but in the end, they are still inexpensive earbuds. I haven't tried the ones costing hundreds of dollars, but at those prices, noise-cancelling over-the-ear headphones are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nii

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a few months ago so that I could have a decent pair of headphones for the gym. The product was said to be "brand new" but when I would start running, the music would skip out. I tried connections to other devices other than the iPhone and the same thing happens. Sure enough, one ear bud is now completely not working. I have been unable to reach the seller, although they contacted me directly previously about taking down a "somewhat positive" review. I would have loved to return these for a new pair but have not been given the option. As of now I am extremely unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buds!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! totally loving the sound quality. I'm not really a big fan of in-ear headphones because it hurts my ears, but decided it was worth it to try on the recommendation of a friend. These buds were comfortable enough for me although I kinda wish they were a little smaller. But great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out the box!
customer_reviews.text: I've probably bought a dozen IEMs in the last year (and a few on ears) both cheap and moderately expensive. I have NEVER had a pair that didn't work right out the box...until now. Only one side worked. After reading the reviews of quality control I decided not to even bother with a like replacement. Yeah yeah I know a few bad apples get thru the batch from ANY brand. Thing is after reading reviews I was reluctant to purchase these already thanks to other reviews and low and behold I should have listened. Shame because they LOOK well built, are very attractive and got pretty good sound quality reviews on head-fi and everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: stan w.

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair!!! Ordered the first pair in PURPLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Do to my hectic life I need 2 pairs of headphones in different locations. I am seriously considering ordering another pair in red!!! Must buy. Fast shipping. Excellent packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Math2000

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect! I love them so much that I ordered another pair in pink. The shipping was very quick and the packaging perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Math2000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A perfect set for the teenager that breaks everything. bought them a month ago and they are still in perfect shape. longest lasting that she's had so far. LoL
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: sound is poor build quality is not that good
customer_reviews.text: the only thing good about this is the case. the sound is dull.. well most earbuds at this price is dull compared to my sr80i and m50s. but this is just dreadful. the lows are muddy and blended with the mids the highs sounds awful the build quality is actually not as good as it seems. The wires are plasticity, and the metal shell feels weaker than my WOODEN ear buds from Meze
customer_reviews.author: wangseongkuan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, they were fantastic...when they worked. After a week, the sound was fading in and out of the right earpiece, didn't bother me too much. A few weeks after that, they completely broke after being tugged at accidentally (earphones fell out while getting through subway traffic) Don't buy them unless you have a month to live.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price range the sound quality is good and enjoyable. The metal casing makes these buds feel of a higher quality. Consideration needs to be given if these buds are compatible with your current smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to get this for myself, but got it for my gf instead. She's definitely not into spending money on earphones. But when she opened the box, the striking color, its a beauty. Great solid feel, and nice hard case. Overall is great.
customer_reviews.author: DerrickLoe

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I don't know how to use them right but I can hear the cord bumping against me at the gym. The sound quality is the excellent though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the colours! Kinda noisy on cable movement. But with the kind of price, i'm happy! Definitely a good buy for such bargain!
customer_reviews.author: DerrickLoe

customer_reviews.title: Sick.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones and the quality is there! I definitely recommend these to people who want good headphones at a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: AWEESOME clear sound, completely worth it and very nice looking design. 100 % recommend this headphones, love them :) XD !!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Perez

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend id-america
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy and excited getting a pair of these high-tech speakers for my iPhone! The bigger my disappointment was! - I have no sound on the left earphone, - I tried to get in contact with id-america, no response on neither one of the e-mail addresses I think I just dispose of the earphones and advise any customer not to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: maurair

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: You pretty much are paying for the pretty packaging. At first I thought these were great until the button started malfunctioning. It is to the point where the wind blows and it stops the music and replays it. That was problem number one. Then these headphones learned new tricks. Now they literally spark in my ear and shock me. Awesome, right? Just buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Creekling

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my commute and they look sharp. The sound is good and I haven't had any complaints from using the mic. I walk a lot in the rain so they appear to do well with exposure to water.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality For Price - Can't Beat Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good my kids keep stealing them from me. I keep purchasing this product because there is NO OTHER product that comes close to the quality for the price. Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Noralee

customer_reviews.title: first pair, one of the earbuds was dead on ...
customer_reviews.text: first pair , one of the earbuds was dead on arrival. they sent me a replacement for free, and then they broke after a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: LittlePinkAngel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $45
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones they sound great. The cord is kinda thin but it is still durable. Should of stocked up when they cost $15 cuz there not worth $45 to me
customer_reviews.author: Bri...

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for our Grandson. He loved the look and the sound quality. However 6 months later they were dropped and stopped working. Not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: MTR

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect any help
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a gift and immediately caught a wire on a jacket zipper and tore it our of the small 'Play' switch. Forget any kind of warranty or paid repair; it does not exist.
customer_reviews.author: billphoto

product_meta.title: ID America IDH101-SIL ID America Spark In-Ear Headphones - Retail Packaging - Silver
product_meta.description: Color:Silver| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSpark High Definition In-ear Headphones are the combination of precision acoustics, unique design and expert ergonomic research. Powerful and accurate acoustics are achieved through high performance dynamic driver and special high definition acoustic filter built-in, resulting in full, explosive bass, intense mid-range and clear treble frequency response that will put a smile on your face every time the music plays. Advanced in-line mic/control for clear phone calls and music playback. Spark is compatible with iPhone, Blackberry and other 3.5mm-plug Smartphones.
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone, iPod, iPad and Most Devices with 3.5mm Jack
Inspired by the shape of an automobile spark plug
Spark is wrapped in 2 layers of aluminum casing to deliver great sound while ensuring solid build quality.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
